name: Devil_catching_bees
description:
This is a simple casual game
The player needs to operate the wasp to avoid the attacking demons.
When the devil catches the wasp, the game will end
The devil will appear from both sides. Move horizontally to the other side.
There are fast moving demons and slow moving demons.

The time above the game is displayed at the top of the screen.


Operation method

Control the wasp with the mouse, move up and down, left and right
